thread.title: Gautami Kapoor in Parvarish season 2!

author: dR Admire
title: Gautami Kapoor in Parvarish season 2!
text: Gautami Kapoor in Parvarish season 2!   According to sources, Gautami Kapoor might be seen playing a key role on the second season of Parvarish... The very talented and popular actress Gautami Kapoor, who is currently seen on Star Plus' show Tere Sheher Mein has bagged yet another show. There has been a speculation about the launch of the second season of DJ's Creative's popular show Parvarrish - Kuchh Khattee Kuchh Meethi (Sony TV) in media since quite a while now. We finally, hear that the show is expected to launch sometime around in the month of November. Our sources have confirmed that, "Gautami has been roped in for essaying a significant role in the upcoming season of Parvarish." We buzzed Gautami Kapoor and producer Deeya Singh but they didn't revert. Keep reading this space for more updates.
